<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">[Bind Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=22)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 321 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodline**
[Undead](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=10)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 mindless undead creature with a level no greater than _bind undead_'s spell level
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 day
</row>

</column>

---

With a word of necromantic power, you seize control of the target. It gains the minion trait. If you or an ally uses any hostile actions against the target, the spell ends.
name: Bind Undead
